# README

This is an R package used in Stat 217 at Montana State University.  Currently, it is only available on GitHub.  

## Installation

You must install the `devtools` package first.

```{r install-devtools, eval=FALSE}
install.packages("devtools")
```

Then, use `install_github` to install this package.

```{r install-catstats, eval=FALSE}
devtools::install_github("kferris10/catstats")
```
